description:
general deep denoising models for cryoEM.

Pipeline for particle picking in cryo-electron microscopy images using convolutional neural networks trained from positive and unlabeled examples.

Topaz: particle picking with positive-unlabeled learning.

A pipeline for particle detection in cryo-electron microscopy images using convolutional neural networks trained from positive and unlabeled examples. Topaz also includes methods for micrograph denoising using deep denoising models.

Improvements to the pretrained denoising models.

Added topaz denoise, a command for denoising micrographs using neural networks.

Topaz is a pipeline for particle picking in cryo-electron micrographs using neural networks and positive-unlabeled learning.

Bepler, T., Morin, A., Rapp, M., Brasch, J., Shapiro, L., Noble, A.

name: Topaz-Denoise
